for _ in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    s = n * (n + 1) / 2
    l = list(map(int, input().split()))[1:]
    t = int(input())
    for i in l:
        s -= i
    n = (n + 1) // 2
    res = (n - t) / n * s
    print('%.4f' % res)

T = int(input())
for x in range(T):
    p = int(input())
    f = list(map(int, input().split()))
    t = int(input())
    tot = p * (p + 1) // 2 - sum(f[1:])
    if p & 1:
        p = p // 2 + 1
    else:
        p = p // 2
    print('{:.4f}'.format(round(tot * (p - t) / p, 4)))

for _ in range(int(input())):
    pages = int(input())
    F = list(map(int, input().split()))
    torn_leaves = int(input())
    total = pages * (pages + 1) / 2 - (sum(F) - F[0])
    if pages & 1:
        pages = pages // 2 + 1
    else:
        pages = pages // 2
    ans = round(total * (pages - torn_leaves) / pages, 4)
    print('{:.4f}'.format(ans))

t = int(input())
for _ in range(t):
    p = int(input())
    l = list(map(int, input().split()))
    f = int(l[0])
    l = l[1:]
    tore = int(input())
    if p % 2 == 0:
        page = p // 2
    else:
        page = p // 2 + 1
    print(f'{(sum([i for i in range(1, p + 1)]) - sum(l)) * (page - tore) / page:.4f}')

t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    l = list(map(int, input().split()))
    x = n * (n + 1) / 2
    for i in range(1, l[0] + 1):
        x = x - l[i]
    f = int(input())
    n = int((n + 1) / 2)
    x = x - x * f / n
    print('%.4f' % x)

for _ in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    r = int(input())
    (s, t) = (n * (n + 1) / 2, (n + 1) // 2)
    for i in range(1, a[0] + 1):
        s -= a[i]
    s = s * (t - r) / t
    print('%.4f' % s)

t = int(input())
for _ in range(t):
    pages = int(input())
    pages_sum = pages * (pages + 1) // 2
    missing_page_numbers = [int(x) for x in input().split()][1:]
    pages_sum -= sum(missing_page_numbers)
    if pages % 2 == 1:
        pages += 1
    missing_leaves = int(input())
    expected_sum = pages_sum - pages_sum * 2 * missing_leaves / pages
    print('{0:.4f}'.format(expected_sum))

T = int(input())
for i in range(T):
    N = int(input())
    S = N * (N + 1) / 2
    L = input().split()
    L.pop(0)
    R = S - sum([int(x) for x in L])
    D = float(input())
    Result = (1.0 - D / ((N + 1) // 2)) * R
    Result = round(Result, 4)
    print('{:.4f}'.format(Result))
